metadata.synopsis: The spirit in the amulet is commenting on the panic room in Ketheric City. It was near here that its occupant was tortured centuries ago.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the panic room with the amulet equipped

0.speaker: GROUP_GLO_MonkAmulet_Spirit
0.text: HeHEE! Blood was once spilled here. My blood, no less. HahahaHA.
0.context: NodeContext: On the verge of madness as always.
